function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and overwhelmed decision-makers","Mitigation":"Timely access to relevant evidence, effective communication, and implementation of mitigation measures","Technologies":"Knowledge translation platforms, data analytics, communication tools","People":"Decision-makers, practitioners, and general population","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, and public health institutions"}]}
